titles.title: Directing the Secretary of Defense to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of any emails in the possession of the Department of Defense or the National Security Agency that were transmitted to or from the email account(s) of former Internal Revenue Service Exempt Organizations Division Director Lois Lerner between January 2009 and April 2011.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported Without Recommendation by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Armed Services. H. Rept. 113-547.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 125.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: 7/22/2014--Reported to House without amendment. Directs the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of any electronic communications in the possession of the Secretary, the Director of the National Security Agency (NSA), or any office that reports to the Secretary or the Director that were transmitted to or from any electronic mail accounts used by Lois Lerner, former Director of the Exempt Organizations Division of the Internal Revenue Service (IRS), between January 1, 2009, and April 30, 2011.
